DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: Trial of Onco-Panel for Geneprofiling to Estimate both Adverse events and Response by cancer treatment (TOP-GEAR)
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT:
Bam files and fastq files in a hospital-based prospective study (TOP-GEAR project, the 2nd stage) to investigate the feasibility and utility of NGS-based analysis of 114 cancer-associated genes (the NCC Oncopanel test).
  DOI: 10.1111/cas.13969

STUDY_ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SureSelect, MiSeq, NextSeq, NCC oncopanel V4
Panel testing for 114 cancer-associated genes in a clinical setting (TOP-GEAR project, the 2nd stage)

title: Trial of Onco-Panel for Geneprofiling to Estimate both Adverse events and Response by cancer treatment (TOP-GEAR)
